text: The Zhaoan Hakka Cultural Hall () is a cultural center in Lunbei Township, Yunlin County, Taiwan. ==Architecture== The center was designed with Hakka architectural style forming a circular house. ==Events== * 2017 Zhaoan Fire Torch Hakka Village Marching Hakka Cultural Festival ==See also== * List of tourist attractions in Taiwan ==References== Category:Cultural centers in Yunlin County
title: Zhaoan Hakka Cultural Hall
